document.full_text: new york prosecutors have asked goldman sachs to explain its behavior in the run-up to the financial crisis, the latest investigation that has cast a pall over the reputation of the largest u.s. investment bank.
document.title: goldman sachs subpoenaed for financial crisis role
lines_and_colors: new york prosecutors have asked goldman sachs to explain its behavior in the run-up to the financial crisis, the latest investigation that has cast a pall over the reputation of the largest u.s. investment bank.
